commit message: Version 0.6 a bit cleaned up and new network protocol.
Added international keyboard support.
Added other resolutions in manifest.
0.7.2 stay awake on input, less debug, fixed leaked ServiceConnection.
Improved page design and added connection status.
Detect multiple input and show message.
0.9: Bug fixes and browser specifics hacks.
Fixed bug in javascript.
Support for unicode supplimentary plains. ServerSocket bugfix.

Internationalization work in progress.
Support keep-alive in http server.
Network protocol in javascript optimized.
Using NIO to support several input connections.
Re-try sending characters on connection problem.
Average latency display. Updated russian translation.
Make automatic switch to HTTP/1.0 if/while one HTTP/1.1 connectio hangs.

Use XmlHttpRequest abort method for hang requests.
That's improves reliability of connection.
Port bind fallback fix.
Prepare to support remote text field editor.

Chinese translation. Probably fix for chinese input. Commented out all debug
logging - reduced memory allocations from 10k per request to ~1k.

Removed duplicated html pages.
Now page template generates from html/key.html during build
On execution strings from resources are inserted into the template.
Bugfixed in make_template.py

Added notification (listen to wifi and data change to update it)
Fixes for port close to avoid port changing.
Remember previous port and reuse it.
Updated Chinese translations.
Wake phone every 5 sec when typing instead of every key.
Small bugfix in javascript.
Fixed: unregister updates from telephony events.
v1.2.1 - bug fixes
Added italian translation.
Tiny cleanup

Update network code to have better separate between stream flow control
and http handling. Now it can be possible to start implementation of
POST requests.
Support for parsing headers and extracting header data.

Work in progress to support POST requests.
Added Search button on F3 key mapping.
Dutch translation.
Change help url for the dutch translation.

Working version of local editor triggered by F4 key.
Swedish translation.

Browser code made a bit ie6 friendly, still not works.
Port updated in the view via callbacks.
Fixed stream problems, output was not written correctly if buffered.

Fixed html handlers and get rid of extra memory allocation.
Fixed Google fonts loading (made asynchronous).

Support for PageUp, PageDown, Ctrl-A, Ctrl-C, Ctrl-V, Ctrl-X, Del.
Async loading of web fonts.
Fixed previous commit.

Get rid of extra debug. Archos and emulator fix:
java.net.preferIPv6Addresses = false

Added Widget for fast input method switch.
Compile fixes for Gingerbread SDK.
Fixes for widget.
2.2.1: Home, End, Ctrl-* and Shift-* combinations fixed.
Support for AltGr+1 as euro sign
2.3.1: Fix null pointer bug with extra workaround.
Catch null pointer exceptions in selectAll if text is null.
Work in progress support for session id.
Added GPL-2 COPYING.txt and corresponding headers to source files.

Revert 'Work in progress support for session id.'

This reverts commit 832628512c2a6b9cb9849f7b1dd1557bb73734cf.
Lower priority of IPv6 addresses
Never go into full screen mode.

Version: 2.3.4

- Disable full screen mode
- Add Ctrl-Del, Ctrl-Backspace combinations
- Long awaiting Enter (or Ctrl-Enter) to submit
Translation for Spanish and a few property changes.
Change message how to select input method on device >= honeycomb.
2.3.5: more complication logic to decide to perform an action on enter press
Added README.md
adding a link to the app on F-Droid

Merge pull request #97 from maxlath/patch-1

adding a link to the app on F-Droid
